existing_features.title: Add the uploaded image `Law-firms1.jpeg` to the frontend static assets and render it as the full-cover background image of the existing homepage hero section (`frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection.tsx`).
Apply a dark tint overlay on top of the hero background image while keeping the existing hero text and CTA readable and visually unchanged in layout.

new_feature_requests.summary: Set the existing homepage hero section background to the provided image with full-cover styling and a dark tint overlay

projectName: Set uploaded image as homepage hero background with dark tint
